thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1850
thread.title: Claudia

author: Claudia
title: Claudia
text:
The search options make it easy to search through the available flights. I was able to find routes that were not available through other travel search sites. The prices were very reasonable. The payment process was quick.
You know how sometimes you get kicked out and have to start the process all over again because you took too long? That didn't happen.
Not a single complaint!
